metadata: (info { (description "This board comes from the Harappan site of Lothal in modern India.") (rules "Sixteen squares arranged in a single square-shaped track, with five spaces on a side.") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1020") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/race/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") (origin "This game was played in India, from around 2125BCE to 1660BCE.") } ) (graphics { (board Colour Phase0 (colour 223 178 110)) (board Colour InnerEdges (colour Black)) (board Colour OuterEdges (colour Black)) })
